[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /net/daemon/dictionary.c

MUD based dictionary, conforms to the DICT new protocol found in RFC 2229. See ftp://ftp.isi.edu/in-notes/rfc2229.txt for more information.

Written by Taffyd@Discworld

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /net/inherit/client.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/network.h and /include/socket_errors.h

Class Index

connection_data
This class handles connection details for each person using the dictionary.
request
This class handles connection details for each person using the dictionary.

Classes

These are nice data types for dealing with... Data!

connection_data
class connection_data {
int fd;
int dns_key;
string message;
mixed definitions;
mixed * working;
string ip_address;
int status;
int count;
string search_mode;
class request current_request;
}
This class handles connection details for each person using the dictionary.

Members:
fd - the file descriptor of the socket currently being used by the dictionary. member dns_key the resolve() key used when doing a nslookup.
request
class request {
string word;
string search_mode;
int type;
int i;
function callback;
}
This class handles connection details for each person using the dictionary.

Members:
fd - the file descriptor of the socket currently being used by the dictionary. member dns_key the resolve() key used when doing a nslookup.
